title: Beautiful Watch Faces
summary: Cool Watch Faces, Beautiful Color Combinations
description: Beautiful Watch Faces from the heart for Android Wear.- 5 Best Color Combinations- Optimised for best battery performance- Optimised for Ambient Mode- Optimised for square watchAfter installing the app wait for 2-3 minutes to sync watch faces to your watch and Android Wear App.Tested on Moto 360 and working well.If you are facing any problem, please report.
descriptionHTML:
Beautiful Watch Faces from the heart for Android Wear.
- 5 Best Color Combinations
- Optimised for best battery performance
- Optimised for Ambient Mode
- Optimised for square watch

After installing the app wait for 2-3 minutes to sync watch faces to your watch and Android Wear App.

Tested on Moto 360 and working well.
If you are facing any problem, please report.
